content_old: 1 The declaration of Yahweh to my Lord— Sit thou at my right hand, Until I make thy foes thy footstool.

content: 2 Thy sceptre of strength will Yahweh extend out of Zion, Tread thou down､ in the midst of thy foes.
content_old: 2 Thy sceptre of strength will Yahweh extend out of Zion, Tread thou down､ in the midst of thy foes.

content: 3 Thy people will freely offer themselves､ in the day of thine army,— In the splendours of holiness､ out of the womb of the dawn To thee shall spring forth the dew of thy youth.
content_old: 3 Thy people will freely offer themselves､ in the day of thine army,— In the splendours of holiness､ out of the womb of the dawn To thee shall spring forth the dew of thy youth.

content: 4 Yahweh hath sworn—and will not repent､ Thou shalt be a priest unto times age-abiding, After the manner of Melchizedek.
content_old: 4 Yahweh hath sworn—and will not repent､ Thou shalt be a priest unto times age-abiding, After the manner of Melchizedek.

content: 5 My Lord､ on thy right hand,— Hath shattered—in the day of his anger—kings;
content_old: 5 My Lord､ on thy right hand,— Hath shattered—in the day of his anger—kings;

content: 6 He will judge among the nations—full of dead bodies! He hath shattered the head over a land far extended:
content_old: 6 He will judge among the nations—full of dead bodies! He hath shattered the head over a land far extended:

content: 1 Praise ye Yah! I will give thanks unto Yahweh､ with a whole heart, In the circle of the upright and the assembly.
content_old: 1 Praise ye Yah! I will give thanks unto Yahweh､ with a whole heart, In the circle of the upright and the assembly.

content: 2 Great are the works of Yahweh, Sought out､ by all who find pleasure therein.
content_old: 2 Great are the works of Yahweh, Sought out､ by all who find pleasure therein.

content: 3 Honourable and majestic is his doing, And his righteousness standeth for aye.
content_old: 3 Honourable and majestic is his doing, And his righteousness standeth for aye.

content: 4 A memorial hath he made by his wonders, Gracious and compassionate is Yahweh.
content_old: 4 A memorial hath he made by his wonders, Gracious and compassionate is Yahweh.

content: 5 Food hath he given to them who revere him, He will remember､ age-abidingly､ his covenant.
content_old: 5 Food hath he given to them who revere him, He will remember､ age-abidingly､ his covenant.

content: 6 The might of his works hath he declared to his people, That he may give them the inheritance of the nations.
content_old: 6 The might of his works hath he declared to his people, That he may give them the inheritance of the nations.

content: 7 The works of his hands are faithful and just, Firm are all his precepts;
content_old: 7 The works of his hands are faithful and just, Firm are all his precepts;

content: 8 Upheld to futurity､ to times age-abiding, Done in faithfulness and equity.
content_old: 8 Upheld to futurity､ to times age-abiding, Done in faithfulness and equity.

content: 9 Ransom hath he sent to his people､ He hath commanded､ to times age-abiding､ his covenant, Holy and reverend is his Name.
content_old: 9 Ransom hath he sent to his people､ He hath commanded､ to times age-abiding､ his covenant, Holy and reverend is his Name.

content: 1 Praise ye Yah! How happy is the man who revereth Yahweh, In his commandments delighteth he greatly;
content_old: 1 Praise ye Yah! How happy is the man who revereth Yahweh, In his commandments delighteth he greatly;

content: 2 Mighty in the earth shall be his seed, The generation of the upright shall be blessed;
content_old: 2 Mighty in the earth shall be his seed, The generation of the upright shall be blessed;

content: 3 Wealth and riches shall be in his house, And his righteousness standeth for aye.
content_old: 3 Wealth and riches shall be in his house, And his righteousness standeth for aye.

content: 4 Risen—in darkness is light to the upright, The gracious and compassionate and righteous.
content_old: 4 Risen—in darkness is light to the upright, The gracious and compassionate and righteous.

content: 5 Well for a man shewing favour and lending! He shall sustain his affairs with justice.
content_old: 5 Well for a man shewing favour and lending! He shall sustain his affairs with justice.

content: 6 Surely､ unto times age-abiding shall he not be shaken, In remembrance age-abiding shall the righteous one remain;
content_old: 6 Surely､ unto times age-abiding shall he not be shaken, In remembrance age-abiding shall the righteous one remain;

content: 7 Of evil tidings shall he not be afraid, Established is his heart､ led to trust in Yahweh;
content_old: 7 Of evil tidings shall he not be afraid, Established is his heart､ led to trust in Yahweh;

content: 8 Upheld is his heart､ he shall not be afraid, Until that he gazeth on his foes.
content_old: 8 Upheld is his heart､ he shall not be afraid, Until that he gazeth on his foes.

content: 9 He hath scattered abroad､ he hath given to the needy､ His righteousness standeth for aye, His horn shall be exalted in honour.
content_old: 9 He hath scattered abroad､ he hath given to the needy､ His righteousness standeth for aye, His horn shall be exalted in honour.

content: 1 Praise ye Yah! Praise､ O ye servants of Yahweh, Praise the Name of Yahweh;
content_old: 1 Praise ye Yah! Praise､ O ye servants of Yahweh, Praise the Name of Yahweh;

content: 2 Be the Name of Yahweh blessed, Henceforth､ even to times age-abiding.
content_old: 2 Be the Name of Yahweh blessed, Henceforth､ even to times age-abiding.

content: 3 From the rising of the sun unto the going in thereof Worthy to be praised is the Name of Yahweh:
content_old: 3 From the rising of the sun unto the going in thereof Worthy to be praised is the Name of Yahweh:

content: 4 High above all nations is Yahweh, Above the heavens his glory.
content_old: 4 High above all nations is Yahweh, Above the heavens his glory.

content: 5 Who is like Yahweh our God? That goeth on high to dwell,
content_old: 5 Who is like Yahweh our God? That goeth on high to dwell,

content: 6 That cometh down low to look, Through the heavens and through the earth;
content_old: 6 That cometh down low to look, Through the heavens and through the earth;

content: 7 That raiseth､ out of the dust､ the poor, From the dunghill uplifteth the needy;
content_old: 7 That raiseth､ out of the dust､ the poor, From the dunghill uplifteth the needy;

content: 8 To give a seat with nobles, With the nobles of his people!
content_old: 8 To give a seat with nobles, With the nobles of his people!

content: 1 When Israel came forth out of Egypt, The house of Jacob from among a people of strange tongue
content_old: 1 When Israel came forth out of Egypt, The house of Jacob from among a people of strange tongue

content: 2 Judah became his sanctuary, Israel his realm:
content_old: 2 Judah became his sanctuary, Israel his realm:

content: 3 The sea beheld､ and fled, The Jordan turned back;
content_old: 3 The sea beheld､ and fled, The Jordan turned back;

content: 4 The mountains started like rams, The hills like the young of the flock?
content_old: 4 The mountains started like rams, The hills like the young of the flock?

content: 5 What aileth thee､ O sea､ that thou fleest? O Jordan､ that thou turnest back?
content_old: 5 What aileth thee､ O sea､ that thou fleest? O Jordan､ that thou turnest back?

content: 6 Ye mountains､ that ye start like rams? Ye hills､ like the young of the flock?
content_old: 6 Ye mountains､ that ye start like rams? Ye hills､ like the young of the flock?

content: 7 Before the Lord be in anguish､ O earth, Before the God of Jacob:
content_old: 7 Before the Lord be in anguish､ O earth, Before the God of Jacob:

content: 1 Not unto us O Yahweh､ not unto us,— But unto thine own Name give glory, concerning thy lovingkindness, concerning thy faithfulness.
content_old: 1 Not unto us O Yahweh､ not unto us,— But unto thine own Name give glory, concerning thy lovingkindness, concerning thy faithfulness.

content: 2 Wherefore should the nations say, Pray where is their God?
content_old: 2 Wherefore should the nations say, Pray where is their God?

content: 3 When our God is in the heavens, Whatsoever he pleased hath he done.
content_old: 3 When our God is in the heavens, Whatsoever he pleased hath he done.

content: 4 Their idols are silver and gold, The work of the hands of men,—
content_old: 4 Their idols are silver and gold, The work of the hands of men,—

content: 5 A mouth have they､ but they speak not, Eyes have they､ but they see not;
content_old: 5 A mouth have they､ but they speak not, Eyes have they､ but they see not;

content: 6 Ears have they､ but they hear not, A nose have they､ but they smell not:
content_old: 6 Ears have they､ but they hear not, A nose have they､ but they smell not:

content: 7 Their hands! but they feel not､ Their feet! but they walk not, No sound make they in their throat.
content_old: 7 Their hands! but they feel not､ Their feet! but they walk not, No sound make they in their throat.

content: 8 Like unto them shall be they who make them, Every one who trusteth in them.
content_old: 8 Like unto them shall be they who make them, Every one who trusteth in them.

content: 9 O Israel! trust thou in Yahweh, Their help and their shield is he!
content_old: 9 O Israel! trust thou in Yahweh, Their help and their shield is he!

content: 10 O house of Aaron! trust ye in Yahweh, Their help and their shield is he!
content_old: 10 O house of Aaron! trust ye in Yahweh, Their help and their shield is he!

content: 11 Ye that revere Yahweh! trust in Yahweh, Their help and their shield is he!
content_old: 11 Ye that revere Yahweh! trust in Yahweh, Their help and their shield is he!

content: 12 Yahweh hath remembered us､ he will bless— He will bless the house of Israel, He will bless the house of Aaron;
content_old: 12 Yahweh hath remembered us､ he will bless— He will bless the house of Israel, He will bless the house of Aaron;

content: 13 He will bless them who revere Yahweh, The small with the great.
content_old: 13 He will bless them who revere Yahweh, The small with the great.

content: 14 Yahweh multiply you, You､ and your children.
content_old: 14 Yahweh multiply you, You､ and your children.

content: 15 Blessed are ye of Yahweh, Who made the heavens and the earth:
content_old: 15 Blessed are ye of Yahweh, Who made the heavens and the earth:

content: 16 As for the heavens the heavens belong to Yahweh, But the earth hath he given to the sons of men.
content_old: 16 As for the heavens the heavens belong to Yahweh, But the earth hath he given to the sons of men.

content: 17 The dead cannot praise Yah, Nor any that go down into silence;
content_old: 17 The dead cannot praise Yah, Nor any that go down into silence;

content: 1 I love Yahweh—because he heareth My voice､ my supplications;
content_old: 1 I love Yahweh—because he heareth My voice､ my supplications;

content: 2 Because he hath bowed down his ear unto me Therefore throughout my days will I call.
content_old: 2 Because he hath bowed down his ear unto me Therefore throughout my days will I call.

content: 3 The meshes of death encompassed me､ And the distresses of hades came upon me, Peril and sorrow I found;
content_old: 3 The meshes of death encompassed me､ And the distresses of hades came upon me, Peril and sorrow I found;

content: 4 But on the Name of Yahweh I called— I beseech thee､ Yahweh､ deliver my soul.
content_old: 4 But on the Name of Yahweh I called— I beseech thee､ Yahweh､ deliver my soul.

content: 5 Gracious is Yahweh and righteous, And our God is full of compassion.
content_old: 5 Gracious is Yahweh and righteous, And our God is full of compassion.

content: 6 Yahweh preserveth the simple, I was brought low, when to me he granted salvation.
content_old: 6 Yahweh preserveth the simple, I was brought low, when to me he granted salvation.

content: 7 Return､ O my soul､ to thy rest, For Yahweh hath dealt bountifully with thee.
content_old: 7 Return､ O my soul､ to thy rest, For Yahweh hath dealt bountifully with thee.

content: 8 For thou hast rescuedmy soul from death,— mine eyes from tears, my feet from stumbling.
content_old: 8 For thou hast rescuedmy soul from death,— mine eyes from tears, my feet from stumbling.

content: 9 I will walk to and fro before Yahweh, in the lands of life.
content_old: 9 I will walk to and fro before Yahweh, in the lands of life.

content: 10 I believed that I should speak, I was greatly depressed.
content_old: 10 I believed that I should speak, I was greatly depressed.

content: 11 I said in mine alarm, All men are false!
content_old: 11 I said in mine alarm, All men are false!

content: 12 How shall I give back to Yahweh, All his benefits unto me?
content_old: 12 How shall I give back to Yahweh, All his benefits unto me?

content: 13 The cup of salvation will I lift, And on the Name of Yahweh will I call:
content_old: 13 The cup of salvation will I lift, And on the Name of Yahweh will I call:

content: 14 My vows—to Yahweh will I pay, Might it be in the presence of all his people!
content_old: 14 My vows—to Yahweh will I pay, Might it be in the presence of all his people!

content: 15 Costly in the eyes of Yahweh Is death for his men of lovingkindness.
content_old: 15 Costly in the eyes of Yahweh Is death for his men of lovingkindness.

content: 16 I beseech thee､ O Yahweh— For I am thy servant,— I am thy servant､ the son of thy handmaid, Thou hast loosened my bonds.
content_old: 16 I beseech thee､ O Yahweh— For I am thy servant,— I am thy servant､ the son of thy handmaid, Thou hast loosened my bonds.

content: 17 To thee will I sacrifice a sacrifice of thanks-giving, And on the Name of Yahweh will I call:
content_old: 17 To thee will I sacrifice a sacrifice of thanks-giving, And on the Name of Yahweh will I call:

content: 18 My vows—to Yahweh will I pay, Might it be in the presence of all his people;—
content_old: 18 My vows—to Yahweh will I pay, Might it be in the presence of all his people;—

content: 1 Praise Yahweh､ all ye nations, Laud him､ all ye tribes of men;
content_old: 1 Praise Yahweh､ all ye nations, Laud him､ all ye tribes of men;

content: 1 Give ye thanks to Yahweh— For he is good, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 1 Give ye thanks to Yahweh— For he is good, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 2 I pray you! let Israel say, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 2 I pray you! let Israel say, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 3 I pray you! let the house of Aaron say, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 3 I pray you! let the house of Aaron say, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 4 I pray you! let them who revere Yahweh say, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 4 I pray you! let them who revere Yahweh say, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 5 Out of a strait called I on Yah, He answered me with enlargement.
content_old: 5 Out of a strait called I on Yah, He answered me with enlargement.

content: 6 Yahweh is on my side､ I will not fear, What can man do unto me?
content_old: 6 Yahweh is on my side､ I will not fear, What can man do unto me?

content: 7 Yahweh is on my side､ with them who help me, I therefore shall gaze upon them who hate me.
content_old: 7 Yahweh is on my side､ with them who help me, I therefore shall gaze upon them who hate me.

content: 8 It is better to seek refuge in Yahweh Than to put confidence in man:
content_old: 8 It is better to seek refuge in Yahweh Than to put confidence in man:

content: 9 It is better to seek refuge in Yahweh Than to put confidence in nobles.
content_old: 9 It is better to seek refuge in Yahweh Than to put confidence in nobles.

content: 10 All nations have compassed me about, In the Name of Yahweh surely I will make them be circumcised;
content_old: 10 All nations have compassed me about, In the Name of Yahweh surely I will make them be circumcised;

content: 11 They have compassed me about—yea compassed me about, In the Name of Yahweh surely I will make them be circumcised;
content_old: 11 They have compassed me about—yea compassed me about, In the Name of Yahweh surely I will make them be circumcised;

content: 12 They have compassed me about like wax bees､ They have blazed up like the fire of thorns, In the Name of Yahweh surely I will make them be circumcised.
content_old: 12 They have compassed me about like wax bees､ They have blazed up like the fire of thorns, In the Name of Yahweh surely I will make them be circumcised.

content: 13 Thou didst thrust sore at me that I might fall, But Yahweh hath helped me.
content_old: 13 Thou didst thrust sore at me that I might fall, But Yahweh hath helped me.

content: 14 My might and melody is Yah, And he hath become mine by salvation.
content_old: 14 My might and melody is Yah, And he hath become mine by salvation.

content: 15 The voice of shouting and salvation is in the tents of the righteous, The right hand of Yahweh is doing valiantly:
content_old: 15 The voice of shouting and salvation is in the tents of the righteous, The right hand of Yahweh is doing valiantly:

content: 16 The right hand of Yahweh is exalted, The right hand of Yahweh is doing valiantly.
content_old: 16 The right hand of Yahweh is exalted, The right hand of Yahweh is doing valiantly.

content: 17 I shall not die､ but live, That I may recount the doings of Yah.
content_old: 17 I shall not die､ but live, That I may recount the doings of Yah.

content: 18 Yah chastened me sore, But unto death did not deliver me.
content_old: 18 Yah chastened me sore, But unto death did not deliver me.

content: 19 Open to me the gates of righteousness, I will enter therein, I will give thanks unto Yah.
content_old: 19 Open to me the gates of righteousness, I will enter therein, I will give thanks unto Yah.

content: 20 This is the gate for Yahweh, Such as are righteous shall enter therein.
content_old: 20 This is the gate for Yahweh, Such as are righteous shall enter therein.

content: 21 I will thank thee､ because thou hast answered me, And hast become mine､ by salvation.
content_old: 21 I will thank thee､ because thou hast answered me, And hast become mine､ by salvation.

content: 22 A stone the builders refused Hath become the head of the corner:
content_old: 22 A stone the builders refused Hath become the head of the corner:

content: 23 From Yahweh hath this come to pass, The same is marvellous in our eyes.
content_old: 23 From Yahweh hath this come to pass, The same is marvellous in our eyes.

content: 24 This is the day､ which Yahweh hath made, We will exult､ and be glad therein.
content_old: 24 This is the day､ which Yahweh hath made, We will exult､ and be glad therein.

content: 25 Ah now､ Yahweh､ do save､ we beseech thee, Ah now､ Yahweh, do send success､ we beseech thee!
content_old: 25 Ah now､ Yahweh､ do save､ we beseech thee, Ah now､ Yahweh, do send success､ we beseech thee!

content: 26 Blessed be he that entereth､ In the Name of Yahweh, We have blessed you､ Out of the house of Yahweh.
content_old: 26 Blessed be he that entereth､ In the Name of Yahweh, We have blessed you､ Out of the house of Yahweh.

content: 27 Yahweh is GOD､ And hath shed on us light,— Bind ye the festal sacrifice with cords, Up to the horns of the altar.
content_old: 27 Yahweh is GOD､ And hath shed on us light,— Bind ye the festal sacrifice with cords, Up to the horns of the altar.

content: 28 My GOD thou art､ and I will thank thee,— My Elohim､ I will exalt thee.
content_old: 28 My GOD thou art､ and I will thank thee,— My Elohim､ I will exalt thee.

content: 1 How happy the men of blameless life, Who walk in the law of Yahweh.
content_old: 1 How happy the men of blameless life, Who walk in the law of Yahweh.

content: 2 How happy they who observe his testimonies, With a whole heart they seek him.
content_old: 2 How happy they who observe his testimonies, With a whole heart they seek him.

content: 3 Yea､ they have not wrought perversity, In his ways have they walked.
content_old: 3 Yea､ they have not wrought perversity, In his ways have they walked.

content: 4 Thou hast commanded thy precepts､ That they should be diligently kept.
content_old: 4 Thou hast commanded thy precepts､ That they should be diligently kept.

content: 5 Oh would that my ways might be settled! That I might keep thy statutes.
content_old: 5 Oh would that my ways might be settled! That I might keep thy statutes.

content: 6 Then shall I not be ashamed, When I have respect unto all thy commandments.
content_old: 6 Then shall I not be ashamed, When I have respect unto all thy commandments.

content: 7 I will thank thee with uprightness of heart, When I have learned thy righteous regulations.
content_old: 7 I will thank thee with uprightness of heart, When I have learned thy righteous regulations.

content: 8 Thy statutes will I keep, Do not thou forsake me utterly.
content_old: 8 Thy statutes will I keep, Do not thou forsake me utterly.

content: 9 Wherewithal can a young man keep pure his way? By taking heed､ according to thy word.
content_old: 9 Wherewithal can a young man keep pure his way? By taking heed､ according to thy word.

content: 10 With all my heart have I sought thee, Suffer me not to be led astray from thy commandments.
content_old: 10 With all my heart have I sought thee, Suffer me not to be led astray from thy commandments.

content: 11 In my heart have I treasured what thou hast said, To the end I may not sin against thee.
content_old: 11 In my heart have I treasured what thou hast said, To the end I may not sin against thee.

content: 12 Blessed art thou､ O Yahweh､— Teach me thy statutes.
content_old: 12 Blessed art thou､ O Yahweh､— Teach me thy statutes.

content: 13 With my lips have I recounted All the regulations of thy mouth.
content_old: 13 With my lips have I recounted All the regulations of thy mouth.

content: 14 In the way of thy testimonies have I rejoiced､ Like as over all riches.
content_old: 14 In the way of thy testimonies have I rejoiced､ Like as over all riches.

content: 15 In thy precepts will I meditate, That I may discern thy paths.
content_old: 15 In thy precepts will I meditate, That I may discern thy paths.

content: 16 In thy statutes will I find my dear delight, I will not forget thy word.
content_old: 16 In thy statutes will I find my dear delight, I will not forget thy word.

content: 17 Bestow thy bounties upon thy servant—let me live, That I may observe thy word.
content_old: 17 Bestow thy bounties upon thy servant—let me live, That I may observe thy word.

content: 18 Unveil thou mine eyes､ that I may discern Wondrous things out of thy law.
content_old: 18 Unveil thou mine eyes､ that I may discern Wondrous things out of thy law.

content: 19 A sojourner am I in the earth, Do not hide from me､ thy commandments.
content_old: 19 A sojourner am I in the earth, Do not hide from me､ thy commandments.

content: 20 My soul is crushed with longing For thy just decisions at all times.
content_old: 20 My soul is crushed with longing For thy just decisions at all times.

content: 21 Thou hast rebuked the proud as accursed, Who stray from thy commandments.
content_old: 21 Thou hast rebuked the proud as accursed, Who stray from thy commandments.

content: 22 Roll from off me､ reproach and contempt, For thy testimonies have I observed.
content_old: 22 Roll from off me､ reproach and contempt, For thy testimonies have I observed.

content: 23 Even rulers have taken their seat､ against me have talked, Thy servant will still meditate in thy statutes.
content_old: 23 Even rulers have taken their seat､ against me have talked, Thy servant will still meditate in thy statutes.

content: 24 Yea thy testimonies are my dear delight, My counsellors.
content_old: 24 Yea thy testimonies are my dear delight, My counsellors.

content: 25 My soul cleaveth to the dust, Give me life､ according to thy word.
content_old: 25 My soul cleaveth to the dust, Give me life､ according to thy word.

content: 26 My ways I recounted､ and thou didst answer me, Teach me thy statutes.
content_old: 26 My ways I recounted､ and thou didst answer me, Teach me thy statutes.

content: 27 The way of thy precepts cause thou me to understand, And I will indeed meditate in thy wonders.
content_old: 27 The way of thy precepts cause thou me to understand, And I will indeed meditate in thy wonders.

content: 28 My soul weepeth itself away､ for grief, Confirm thou me､ according to thy word.
content_old: 28 My soul weepeth itself away､ for grief, Confirm thou me､ according to thy word.

content: 29 The way of falsehood take thou from me, And with thy law O favour me.
content_old: 29 The way of falsehood take thou from me, And with thy law O favour me.

content: 30 The way of faithfulness have I chosen, Thy regulations have I deemed right.
content_old: 30 The way of faithfulness have I chosen, Thy regulations have I deemed right.

content: 31 I have kept close to thy testimonies, O Yahweh! do not put me to shame.
content_old: 31 I have kept close to thy testimonies, O Yahweh! do not put me to shame.

content: 32 The way of thy commandments will I run, For thou wilt enlarge my heart.
content_old: 32 The way of thy commandments will I run, For thou wilt enlarge my heart.

content: 33 Point out to me､ O Yahweh､ the way of thy statutes､ That I may observe it unto the end.
content_old: 33 Point out to me､ O Yahweh､ the way of thy statutes､ That I may observe it unto the end.

content: 34 Give me understanding､ that I may observe thy law, That I may keep it with a whole heart.
content_old: 34 Give me understanding､ that I may observe thy law, That I may keep it with a whole heart.

content: 35 Guide me in the path of thy commandments, For therein do I find pleasure.
content_old: 35 Guide me in the path of thy commandments, For therein do I find pleasure.

content: 36 Incline my heart unto thy testimonies､ And not unto unjust gain.
content_old: 36 Incline my heart unto thy testimonies､ And not unto unjust gain.

content: 37 Turn away mine eyes､ from beholding vanity, In thy way give me life.
content_old: 37 Turn away mine eyes､ from beholding vanity, In thy way give me life.

content: 38 Establish､ unto thy servant､ thy word, Which pertaineth to the reverence of thee.
content_old: 38 Establish､ unto thy servant､ thy word, Which pertaineth to the reverence of thee.

content: 39 Cause to pass away my reproach､ that I have feared, For thy regulations are good.
content_old: 39 Cause to pass away my reproach､ that I have feared, For thy regulations are good.

content: 40 Lo! I have longed for thy precepts, In thy righteousness give me life.
content_old: 40 Lo! I have longed for thy precepts, In thy righteousness give me life.

content: 41 And let thy lovingkindness reach me､ O Yahweh, Thy salvation､ according to thy word.
content_old: 41 And let thy lovingkindness reach me､ O Yahweh, Thy salvation､ according to thy word.

content: 42 So shall I have something to answer him that reproacheth me, That I have trusted in thy word.
content_old: 42 So shall I have something to answer him that reproacheth me, That I have trusted in thy word.

content: 43 And do not snatch away from my mouth the word of truth in any wise, Because for thy regulation have I waited.
content_old: 43 And do not snatch away from my mouth the word of truth in any wise, Because for thy regulation have I waited.

content: 44 That I may keep thy law continually､ To times age-abiding and beyond.
content_old: 44 That I may keep thy law continually､ To times age-abiding and beyond.

content: 45 That I may walk to and fro in a large place, Because thy precepts have I sought.
content_old: 45 That I may walk to and fro in a large place, Because thy precepts have I sought.

content: 46 That I may speak of thy testimonies before kings, And not be ashamed.
content_old: 46 That I may speak of thy testimonies before kings, And not be ashamed.

content: 47 That I may find dear delight in thy commandments､ Which I have loved.
content_old: 47 That I may find dear delight in thy commandments､ Which I have loved.

content: 48 That I may lift up my hands unto thy commandments､ which I have loved､ And may meditate in thy statutes.
content_old: 48 That I may lift up my hands unto thy commandments､ which I have loved､ And may meditate in thy statutes.

content: 49 Remember the word unto thy servant, Upon which thou hast caused me to hope.
content_old: 49 Remember the word unto thy servant, Upon which thou hast caused me to hope.

content: 50 This is my comfort in mine affliction, That thy word hath given me life.
content_old: 50 This is my comfort in mine affliction, That thy word hath given me life.

content: 51 Insolent men have derided me exceedingly, From thy law have I not swerved.
content_old: 51 Insolent men have derided me exceedingly, From thy law have I not swerved.

content: 52 I have remembered thy regulations which have come down from age-past times､ O Yahweh, And have consoled myself.
content_old: 52 I have remembered thy regulations which have come down from age-past times､ O Yahweh, And have consoled myself.

content: 53 A raging heat hath seized me､ by reason of the lawless, Who forsake thy law.
content_old: 53 A raging heat hath seized me､ by reason of the lawless, Who forsake thy law.

content: 54 Songs have thy statutes become to me､ In my house of sojourn.
content_old: 54 Songs have thy statutes become to me､ In my house of sojourn.

content: 55 I have remembered､ in the night､ thy Name､ O Yahweh, And have kept thy law.
content_old: 55 I have remembered､ in the night､ thy Name､ O Yahweh, And have kept thy law.

content: 56 This have I had, Because thy precepts have I observed.
content_old: 56 This have I had, Because thy precepts have I observed.

content: 57 My portion is Yahweh､ I have promised that I would keep thy words.
content_old: 57 My portion is Yahweh､ I have promised that I would keep thy words.

content: 58 I have sought the smile of thy face with all my heart, Shew me favour､ according to thy word.
content_old: 58 I have sought the smile of thy face with all my heart, Shew me favour､ according to thy word.

content: 59 I have thought upon my ways, And have turned my feet unto thy testimonies.
content_old: 59 I have thought upon my ways, And have turned my feet unto thy testimonies.

content: 60 I have hastened､ and not delayed, To keep thy commandments.
content_old: 60 I have hastened､ and not delayed, To keep thy commandments.

content: 61 The meshes of the lawless have surrounded me, Thy law have I not forgotten.
content_old: 61 The meshes of the lawless have surrounded me, Thy law have I not forgotten.

content: 62 At midnight I arise to give thanks unto thee, For thy righteous regulations.
content_old: 62 At midnight I arise to give thanks unto thee, For thy righteous regulations.

content: 63 Companion am I､ to all who revere thee, And to them who keep thy precepts.
content_old: 63 Companion am I､ to all who revere thee, And to them who keep thy precepts.

content: 64 Of thy lovingkindness O Yahweh､ the earth is full､ Thy statutes teach thou me. ṬETH
content_old: 64 Of thy lovingkindness O Yahweh､ the earth is full､ Thy statutes teach thou me. ṬETH

content: 65 Well hast thou dealt with thy servant, O Yahweh､ according to thy word.
content_old: 65 Well hast thou dealt with thy servant, O Yahweh､ according to thy word.

content: 66 Good judgment and knowledge teach thou me, For in thy commandments have I trusted.
content_old: 66 Good judgment and knowledge teach thou me, For in thy commandments have I trusted.

content: 67 Before I was afflicted I myself was going astray, But now thy words have I kept.
content_old: 67 Before I was afflicted I myself was going astray, But now thy words have I kept.

content: 68 Good thou art､ and doing good, Teach me thy statutes.
content_old: 68 Good thou art､ and doing good, Teach me thy statutes.

content: 69 Insolent men have plastered falsehood over me, I with a whole heart will observe thy precepts.
content_old: 69 Insolent men have plastered falsehood over me, I with a whole heart will observe thy precepts.

content: 70 Gross､ like fat is their heart, I in thy law have found dear delight.
content_old: 70 Gross､ like fat is their heart, I in thy law have found dear delight.

content: 71 It is well for me that I was afflicted, That I might learn thy statutes.
content_old: 71 It is well for me that I was afflicted, That I might learn thy statutes.

content: 72 Better to me is the law of thy mouth, Than thousands of gold and silver.
content_old: 72 Better to me is the law of thy mouth, Than thousands of gold and silver.

content: 73 Thine own hands have made me､ and formed me. Give me understanding､ that I may learn thy commandments.
content_old: 73 Thine own hands have made me､ and formed me. Give me understanding､ that I may learn thy commandments.

content: 74 They who revere thee shall see me and rejoice That for thy word I waited.
content_old: 74 They who revere thee shall see me and rejoice That for thy word I waited.

content: 75 I know､ O Yahweh､ that righteous are thy regulations, And in faithfulness didst thou afflict me.
content_old: 75 I know､ O Yahweh､ that righteous are thy regulations, And in faithfulness didst thou afflict me.

content: 76 Let thy lovingkindness､ I beseech thee､ serve to comfort me, According to thy word to thy servant.
content_old: 76 Let thy lovingkindness､ I beseech thee､ serve to comfort me, According to thy word to thy servant.

content: 77 Let thy compassions reach me､ that I may live, For thy law is my dear delight.
content_old: 77 Let thy compassions reach me､ that I may live, For thy law is my dear delight.

content: 78 Let insolent men be ashamed､ because by means of falsehood they have dealt with me perversely, I will meditate in thy precepts.
content_old: 78 Let insolent men be ashamed､ because by means of falsehood they have dealt with me perversely, I will meditate in thy precepts.

content: 79 Let them who revere thee turn unto me, Even they who know thy testimonies.
content_old: 79 Let them who revere thee turn unto me, Even they who know thy testimonies.

content: 80 Let my heart be thorough in thy statutes, That I may not be ashamed.
content_old: 80 Let my heart be thorough in thy statutes, That I may not be ashamed.

content: 81 My soul hath languished for thy salvation, For thy word have I hoped.
content_old: 81 My soul hath languished for thy salvation, For thy word have I hoped.

content: 82 Mine eyes have failed for thy word, Saying､ When wilt thou comfort me?
content_old: 82 Mine eyes have failed for thy word, Saying､ When wilt thou comfort me?

content: 83 Though I have been like a wine-skin in the smoke Thy statutes have I not forgotten.
content_old: 83 Though I have been like a wine-skin in the smoke Thy statutes have I not forgotten.

content: 84 How few are the days of thy servant! When wilt thou execute sentence on my persecutors?
content_old: 84 How few are the days of thy servant! When wilt thou execute sentence on my persecutors?

content: 85 Insolent men digged for me pits, Men who are not according to thy law.
content_old: 85 Insolent men digged for me pits, Men who are not according to thy law.

content: 86 All thy commandments are faithful, With falsehood have they persecuted me､ O help me!
content_old: 86 All thy commandments are faithful, With falsehood have they persecuted me､ O help me!

content: 87 A little more and they had consumed me in the earth, But I forsook not thy precepts.
content_old: 87 A little more and they had consumed me in the earth, But I forsook not thy precepts.

content: 88 According to thy lovingkindness give thou me life, So will I keep the testimonies of thy mouth.
content_old: 88 According to thy lovingkindness give thou me life, So will I keep the testimonies of thy mouth.

content: 89 Age-abidingly O Yahweh, Hath thy word been set up in the heavens.
content_old: 89 Age-abidingly O Yahweh, Hath thy word been set up in the heavens.

content: 90 To generation after generation is thy faithfulness, Thou hast established the earth､ and it standeth.
content_old: 90 To generation after generation is thy faithfulness, Thou hast established the earth､ and it standeth.

content: 91 By thy regulations do they stand to-day, For all are thy servants.
content_old: 91 By thy regulations do they stand to-day, For all are thy servants.

content: 92 Had not thy law been my dear delight Then had I perished in mine affliction.
content_old: 92 Had not thy law been my dear delight Then had I perished in mine affliction.

content: 93 Unto times age-abiding will I not forget thy precepts, For by them hast thou given me life.
content_old: 93 Unto times age-abiding will I not forget thy precepts, For by them hast thou given me life.

content: 94 Thine am I—oh save me! For thy precepts have I sought.
content_old: 94 Thine am I—oh save me! For thy precepts have I sought.

content: 95 For me have the lawless waited､ to destroy me, Thy testimonies will I diligently consider.
content_old: 95 For me have the lawless waited､ to destroy me, Thy testimonies will I diligently consider.

content: 96 To all perfection have I seen an end, Broad is thy commandment exceedingly.
content_old: 96 To all perfection have I seen an end, Broad is thy commandment exceedingly.

content: 97 Oh how I love thy law! All the day is it my meditation.
content_old: 97 Oh how I love thy law! All the day is it my meditation.

content: 98 Beyond mine enemies will thy commandment make me wise, For age-abidingly shall it be mine.
content_old: 98 Beyond mine enemies will thy commandment make me wise, For age-abidingly shall it be mine.

content: 99 Beyond all my teachers have I shewn discretion, For thy testimonies are my meditation.
content_old: 99 Beyond all my teachers have I shewn discretion, For thy testimonies are my meditation.

content: 100 Beyond the elders will I shew understanding, For thy precepts have I observed.
content_old: 100 Beyond the elders will I shew understanding, For thy precepts have I observed.

content: 101 From every way of wickedness have I withheld my feet, That I might keep thy word.
content_old: 101 From every way of wickedness have I withheld my feet, That I might keep thy word.

content: 102 From thy regulations have I not turned aside, For thou hast directed me.
content_old: 102 From thy regulations have I not turned aside, For thou hast directed me.

content: 103 How smooth to my palate is thy speech, More than honey to my mouth.
content_old: 103 How smooth to my palate is thy speech, More than honey to my mouth.

content: 104 Out of thy precepts will I get understanding, For this cause do I hate every false way.
content_old: 104 Out of thy precepts will I get understanding, For this cause do I hate every false way.

content: 105 A lamp to my feet is thy word, And a light to my path.
content_old: 105 A lamp to my feet is thy word, And a light to my path.

content: 106 I sware､ and have fulfilled, To keep thy righteous regulations.
content_old: 106 I sware､ and have fulfilled, To keep thy righteous regulations.

content: 107 I have been afflicted exceedingly,— Yahweh､ give me life according to thy word.
content_old: 107 I have been afflicted exceedingly,— Yahweh､ give me life according to thy word.

content: 108 The freewill offerings of my mouth accept､ I pray thee､ O Yahweh, And thy regulations teach thou me.
content_old: 108 The freewill offerings of my mouth accept､ I pray thee､ O Yahweh, And thy regulations teach thou me.

content: 109 My life is in my hand continually, Yet thy laws have I not forgotten.
content_old: 109 My life is in my hand continually, Yet thy laws have I not forgotten.

content: 110 The lawless have set a snare for me, Yet from thy precepts have I not strayed.
content_old: 110 The lawless have set a snare for me, Yet from thy precepts have I not strayed.

content: 111 As an inheritance have I taken thy testimonies unto times age-abiding, For the joy of my heart they are.
content_old: 111 As an inheritance have I taken thy testimonies unto times age-abiding, For the joy of my heart they are.

content: 112 I have inclined my heart to perform thy statutes, Age-abidingly､ to the end.
content_old: 112 I have inclined my heart to perform thy statutes, Age-abidingly､ to the end.

content: 113 Half-hearted ones do I hate, But thy laws do I love.
content_old: 113 Half-hearted ones do I hate, But thy laws do I love.

content: 114 My hiding-place and my buckler thou art, For thy word have I waited.
content_old: 114 My hiding-place and my buckler thou art, For thy word have I waited.

content: 115 Depart from me､ ye evil-doers,— That I may observe the commandments of my God.
content_old: 115 Depart from me､ ye evil-doers,— That I may observe the commandments of my God.

content: 116 Uphold me according to thy word､ that I may live, And do not shame me out of my hope!
content_old: 116 Uphold me according to thy word､ that I may live, And do not shame me out of my hope!

content: 117 Sustain me､ that I may be saved, And may find dear delight in thy statutes continually.
content_old: 117 Sustain me､ that I may be saved, And may find dear delight in thy statutes continually.

content: 118 Thou hast made light of all who stray from thy statutes, For their fraud is falsehood.
content_old: 118 Thou hast made light of all who stray from thy statutes, For their fraud is falsehood.

content: 119 Dross have I accounted all the lawless of the earth, Therefore do I love thy testimonies.
content_old: 119 Dross have I accounted all the lawless of the earth, Therefore do I love thy testimonies.

content: 120 My flesh bristled up from dread of thee, And of thy regulations stand I in fear.
content_old: 120 My flesh bristled up from dread of thee, And of thy regulations stand I in fear.

content: 121 I have done justice and righteousness,— Do not leave me to mine oppressors.
content_old: 121 I have done justice and righteousness,— Do not leave me to mine oppressors.

content: 122 Be thou surety for thy servant for good, Let not insolent men oppress me.
content_old: 122 Be thou surety for thy servant for good, Let not insolent men oppress me.

content: 123 Mine eyes have become dim for thy salvation, And for thy righteous word.
content_old: 123 Mine eyes have become dim for thy salvation, And for thy righteous word.

content: 124 Deal with thy servant according to thy loving-kindness, And thy statutes teach thou me.
content_old: 124 Deal with thy servant according to thy loving-kindness, And thy statutes teach thou me.

content: 125 Thy servant I am—give me understanding, So shall I get to know thy testimonies.
content_old: 125 Thy servant I am—give me understanding, So shall I get to know thy testimonies.

content: 126 It is time that Yahweh should work, They have frustrated thy law!
content_old: 126 It is time that Yahweh should work, They have frustrated thy law!

content: 127 For this cause do I love thy commandments, More than gold､ yea than fine gold!
content_old: 127 For this cause do I love thy commandments, More than gold､ yea than fine gold!

content: 128 For this cause all thy precepts concerning all things I deem right, Every way of falsehood I hate.
content_old: 128 For this cause all thy precepts concerning all things I deem right, Every way of falsehood I hate.

content: 129 PE Wonderful are thy testimonies, For this cause hath my soul observed them.
content_old: 129 PE Wonderful are thy testimonies, For this cause hath my soul observed them.

content: 130 The opening of thy words sheddeth light, Giving understanding to the simple.
content_old: 130 The opening of thy words sheddeth light, Giving understanding to the simple.

content: 131 My mouth have I opened wide､ and panted, Because for thy commandments have I longed.
content_old: 131 My mouth have I opened wide､ and panted, Because for thy commandments have I longed.

content: 132 Turn thyself unto me､ and shew me favour,— As is befitting､ to the lovers of thy Name.
content_old: 132 Turn thyself unto me､ and shew me favour,— As is befitting､ to the lovers of thy Name.

content: 133 My steps direct thou by thy word, And let no iniquity have dominion over me.
content_old: 133 My steps direct thou by thy word, And let no iniquity have dominion over me.

content: 134 Set me free from the oppression of man, So will I keep thy precepts.
content_old: 134 Set me free from the oppression of man, So will I keep thy precepts.

content: 135 Thy face light thou up on thy servant, And teach me thy statutes.
content_old: 135 Thy face light thou up on thy servant, And teach me thy statutes.

content: 136 Streams of water have run down mine eyes, Because men have not kept thy law.
content_old: 136 Streams of water have run down mine eyes, Because men have not kept thy law.

content: 137 Righteous art thou､ O Yahweh,— And equitable are thy regulations.
content_old: 137 Righteous art thou､ O Yahweh,— And equitable are thy regulations.

content: 138 Thou hast righteously commanded thy testimonies, Yea in great faithfulness.
content_old: 138 Thou hast righteously commanded thy testimonies, Yea in great faithfulness.

content: 139 My zeal hath put an end to me, For mine adversaries have forgotten thy words.
content_old: 139 My zeal hath put an end to me, For mine adversaries have forgotten thy words.

content: 140 Refined is thy word､ to the uttermost, And thy servant loveth it.
content_old: 140 Refined is thy word､ to the uttermost, And thy servant loveth it.

content: 141 Small am I､ and despised, Thy precepts have I not forgotten.
content_old: 141 Small am I､ and despised, Thy precepts have I not forgotten.

content: 142 Thy righteousness is righteous to times age-abiding, And thy law is truth.
content_old: 142 Thy righteousness is righteous to times age-abiding, And thy law is truth.

content: 143 Straitness and distress have befallen me, Thy commandments are my dear delights.
content_old: 143 Straitness and distress have befallen me, Thy commandments are my dear delights.

content: 144 Righteous are thy testimonies､ unto times age-abiding, Give me understanding､ that I may live.
content_old: 144 Righteous are thy testimonies､ unto times age-abiding, Give me understanding､ that I may live.

content: 145 I have cried out with all my heart, answer me､ O Yahweh; Thy statutes will I observe.
content_old: 145 I have cried out with all my heart, answer me､ O Yahweh; Thy statutes will I observe.

content: 146 I have cried out unto thee､ oh save me, That I may keep thy testimonies.
content_old: 146 I have cried out unto thee､ oh save me, That I may keep thy testimonies.

content: 147 I forestalled the twilight､ and cried for help, For thy word I waited.
content_old: 147 I forestalled the twilight､ and cried for help, For thy word I waited.

content: 148 Mine eyes forestalled the night-watches, To meditate in thy word.
content_old: 148 Mine eyes forestalled the night-watches, To meditate in thy word.

content: 149 My voice O hear､ according to thy lovingkindness, O Yahweh! according to thy wont give me life.
content_old: 149 My voice O hear､ according to thy lovingkindness, O Yahweh! according to thy wont give me life.

content: 150 They have drawn near､ who pursue villainy, From thy law have they gone far away.
content_old: 150 They have drawn near､ who pursue villainy, From thy law have they gone far away.

content: 151 Near art thou､ O Yahweh, And all thy commandments are truth.
content_old: 151 Near art thou､ O Yahweh, And all thy commandments are truth.

content: 152 Long have I known､ from thy testimonies, That to times age-abiding thou didst establish them.
content_old: 152 Long have I known､ from thy testimonies, That to times age-abiding thou didst establish them.

content: 153 Behold mine affliction､ and rescue me, For thy law have I not forgotten.
content_old: 153 Behold mine affliction､ and rescue me, For thy law have I not forgotten.

content: 154 Plead my cause､ and redeem me, By thy word give me life.
content_old: 154 Plead my cause､ and redeem me, By thy word give me life.

content: 155 Far from the lawless is salvation, For thy statutes have they not sought.
content_old: 155 Far from the lawless is salvation, For thy statutes have they not sought.

content: 156 Thy compassions are great､ O Yahweh, According to thy regulations give me life.
content_old: 156 Thy compassions are great､ O Yahweh, According to thy regulations give me life.

content: 157 Many are my persecutors and mine adversaries, From thy testimonies have I not swerved.
content_old: 157 Many are my persecutors and mine adversaries, From thy testimonies have I not swerved.

content: 158 I have seen traitors､ and felt loathing, Because thy word they kept not.
content_old: 158 I have seen traitors､ and felt loathing, Because thy word they kept not.

content: 159 See thou that thy precepts I have loved, O Yahweh according to thy lovingkindness give me life.
content_old: 159 See thou that thy precepts I have loved, O Yahweh according to thy lovingkindness give me life.

content: 160 The sum of thy word is truth, And age-abiding is every one of thy righteous regulations.
content_old: 160 The sum of thy word is truth, And age-abiding is every one of thy righteous regulations.

content: 161 Rulers have persecuted me､ without cause, But of thy word hath my heart stood in awe.
content_old: 161 Rulers have persecuted me､ without cause, But of thy word hath my heart stood in awe.

content: 162 Joyful am I over thy word, Like the finder of spoil in abundance.
content_old: 162 Joyful am I over thy word, Like the finder of spoil in abundance.

content: 163 Falsehood I hate and abhor, Thy law do I love.
content_old: 163 Falsehood I hate and abhor, Thy law do I love.

content: 164 Seven times in the day have I praised thee, For thy righteous regulations.
content_old: 164 Seven times in the day have I praised thee, For thy righteous regulations.

content: 165 Blessing in abundance have the lovers of thy law, And nothing to make them stumble.
content_old: 165 Blessing in abundance have the lovers of thy law, And nothing to make them stumble.

content: 166 I have looked for thy salvation､ O Yahweh, And thy commandments have I done.
content_old: 166 I have looked for thy salvation､ O Yahweh, And thy commandments have I done.

content: 167 My soul hath kept thy testimonies, Yea I have loved them greatly.
content_old: 167 My soul hath kept thy testimonies, Yea I have loved them greatly.

content: 168 I have kept thy precepts､ and thy testimonies, For all my ways are before thee.
content_old: 168 I have kept thy precepts､ and thy testimonies, For all my ways are before thee.

content: 169 Let my shouting come near before thee､ O Yahweh, According to thy word give me understanding.
content_old: 169 Let my shouting come near before thee､ O Yahweh, According to thy word give me understanding.

content: 170 Let my supplication come in before thee, According to thy word deliver me.
content_old: 170 Let my supplication come in before thee, According to thy word deliver me.

content: 171 My lips shall pour out praise, When thou shalt teach me thy statutes.
content_old: 171 My lips shall pour out praise, When thou shalt teach me thy statutes.

content: 172 My tongue shall respond with thy word, For all thy commandments are righteous.
content_old: 172 My tongue shall respond with thy word, For all thy commandments are righteous.

content: 173 Be thy hand ready to help me, For thy statutes have I chosen.
content_old: 173 Be thy hand ready to help me, For thy statutes have I chosen.

content: 174 I have longed for thy salvation､ O Yahweh, And thy law is my dear delight.
content_old: 174 I have longed for thy salvation､ O Yahweh, And thy law is my dear delight.

content: 175 Let my soul live､ that it may praise thee, So shall thy regulation help me.
content_old: 175 Let my soul live､ that it may praise thee, So shall thy regulation help me.

content: A Song of Ascents.
content_old: A Song of Ascents.

content: 1 Unto Yahweh､ in the distress that befell me I cried—and he answered me.
content_old: 1 Unto Yahweh､ in the distress that befell me I cried—and he answered me.

content: 2 O Yahweh! rescue thou my soul— From the false lip, From the deceitful tongue.
content_old: 2 O Yahweh! rescue thou my soul— From the false lip, From the deceitful tongue.

content: 3 What shall be given to thee､ And what shall be added to thee Thou deceitful tongue?
content_old: 3 What shall be given to thee､ And what shall be added to thee Thou deceitful tongue?

content: 4 The arrows of the hero sharpened, With burning coals of broom.
content_old: 4 The arrows of the hero sharpened, With burning coals of broom.

content: 5 Woe is me､ That I sojourn in Meshek,— That I abide near the tents of Kedar!
content_old: 5 Woe is me､ That I sojourn in Meshek,— That I abide near the tents of Kedar!

content: 6 Long hath my soul had her dwelling With him that hateth peace:
content_old: 6 Long hath my soul had her dwelling With him that hateth peace:

content: A Song of Ascents
content_old: A Song of Ascents

content: 1 I will lift up mine eyes､ unto the mountains, From whence cometh my help!
content_old: 1 I will lift up mine eyes､ unto the mountains, From whence cometh my help!

content: 2 My help is from Yahweh, Who made heavens and earth.
content_old: 2 My help is from Yahweh, Who made heavens and earth.

content: 3 May he not suffer thy foot to slip, May thy keeper not slumber!
content_old: 3 May he not suffer thy foot to slip, May thy keeper not slumber!

content: 4 Lo! neither will slumber nor sleep The keeper of Israel.
content_old: 4 Lo! neither will slumber nor sleep The keeper of Israel.

content: 5 Yahweh is thy keeper, Yahweh is thy shade､ on thy right hand:
content_old: 5 Yahweh is thy keeper, Yahweh is thy shade､ on thy right hand:

content: 6 By day the sun shall not smite､ Nor the moon by night.
content_old: 6 By day the sun shall not smite､ Nor the moon by night.

content: 7 Yahweh will keep thee from all harm, He will keep thy life.
content_old: 7 Yahweh will keep thee from all harm, He will keep thy life.

content: A Song of Ascents. David’s.
content_old: A Song of Ascents. David’s.

content: 1 I was glad､ when they were saying unto me, Unto the house of Yahweh let us go!
content_old: 1 I was glad､ when they were saying unto me, Unto the house of Yahweh let us go!

content: 2 Standing are our feet, Within thy gates､ O Jerusalem!
content_old: 2 Standing are our feet, Within thy gates､ O Jerusalem!

content: 3 Jerusalem! that hath been builded, A true city､ all joined together as one:
content_old: 3 Jerusalem! that hath been builded, A true city､ all joined together as one:

content: 4 Whither have come up the tribes､ The tribes of Yah､ A testimony to Israel, To give thanks unto the Name of Yahweh:
content_old: 4 Whither have come up the tribes､ The tribes of Yah､ A testimony to Israel, To give thanks unto the Name of Yahweh:

content: 5 For there are set— Thrones for justice, Thrones for the house of David.
content_old: 5 For there are set— Thrones for justice, Thrones for the house of David.

content: 6 Ask ye for the peace of Jerusalem, They shall prosper who love thee!
content_old: 6 Ask ye for the peace of Jerusalem, They shall prosper who love thee!

content: 7 Peace be within thy walls, Prosperity within thy palaces:
content_old: 7 Peace be within thy walls, Prosperity within thy palaces:

content: 8 For the sake of my brethren and friends Oh､ might I speak saying ､ Peace be within thee!
content_old: 8 For the sake of my brethren and friends Oh､ might I speak saying ､ Peace be within thee!

content: A Song of Ascents
content_old: A Song of Ascents

content: 1 Unto thee have I lifted up mine eyes, O thou who art enthroned in the heavens.
content_old: 1 Unto thee have I lifted up mine eyes, O thou who art enthroned in the heavens.

content: 2 Lo! as the eyes of men-servants are unto the hand of their masters､ As the eyes of a maid-servant､ unto the hand of her mistress So are our eyes､ unto Yahweh our God, Until that he shew us favour.
content_old: 2 Lo! as the eyes of men-servants are unto the hand of their masters､ As the eyes of a maid-servant､ unto the hand of her mistress So are our eyes､ unto Yahweh our God, Until that he shew us favour.

content: 3 Shew us favour､ O Yahweh､ shew us favour, For exceedingly are we sated with contempt:
content_old: 3 Shew us favour､ O Yahweh､ shew us favour, For exceedingly are we sated with contempt:

content: A Song of Ascents. David’s.
content_old: A Song of Ascents. David’s.

content: 1 If it had not been Yahweh who was on our side Oh might Israel say:
content_old: 1 If it had not been Yahweh who was on our side Oh might Israel say:

content: 2 If it had not been Yahweh who was on our side, When men rose up against us
content_old: 2 If it had not been Yahweh who was on our side, When men rose up against us

content: 3 Then alive had they swallowed us up, In the glow of their anger against us;
content_old: 3 Then alive had they swallowed us up, In the glow of their anger against us;

content: 4 Then the waters had whelmed us, The torrent gone over our soul;
content_old: 4 Then the waters had whelmed us, The torrent gone over our soul;

content: 5 Then had gone over our soul The waters so proud!
content_old: 5 Then had gone over our soul The waters so proud!

content: 6 Blessed be Yahweh, Who gave us not as prey to their teeth.
content_old: 6 Blessed be Yahweh, Who gave us not as prey to their teeth.

content: 7 Our soul as a bird hath escaped from the snare of the fowlers, The snare is broken､ and we are escaped:
content_old: 7 Our soul as a bird hath escaped from the snare of the fowlers, The snare is broken､ and we are escaped:

content: A Song of Ascents
content_old: A Song of Ascents

content: 1 They who trust in Yahweh Are like Mount Zion Which shall not be shaken, Age-abidingly shall it remain.
content_old: 1 They who trust in Yahweh Are like Mount Zion Which shall not be shaken, Age-abidingly shall it remain.

content: 2 Jerusalem! mountains are round about her; And Yahweh is round about his people, From henceforth even unto times age-abiding.
content_old: 2 Jerusalem! mountains are round about her; And Yahweh is round about his people, From henceforth even unto times age-abiding.

content: 3 For the sceptre of lawlessness shall not remain over the allotment of the righteous,— Lest the righteous put forth—unto perversity—their hands.
content_old: 3 For the sceptre of lawlessness shall not remain over the allotment of the righteous,— Lest the righteous put forth—unto perversity—their hands.

content: 4 Do good､ O Yahweh､ unto such as are good, Even unto such as are upright in their hearts.
content_old: 4 Do good､ O Yahweh､ unto such as are good, Even unto such as are upright in their hearts.

content: A Song of Ascents
content_old: A Song of Ascents

content: 1 When Yahweh brought back the captives of Zion We were like them who dream:
content_old: 1 When Yahweh brought back the captives of Zion We were like them who dream:

content: 2 Then was our mouth filled with laughter､ And our tongue with a shout of triumph,— Then said they among the nations, Yahweh hath done great things with these!
content_old: 2 Then was our mouth filled with laughter､ And our tongue with a shout of triumph,— Then said they among the nations, Yahweh hath done great things with these!

content: 3 Yahweh hath done great things with us､ We are full of joy!
content_old: 3 Yahweh hath done great things with us､ We are full of joy!

content: 4 Bring thou back､ O Yahweh､ our captives, Like channels in the South.
content_old: 4 Bring thou back､ O Yahweh､ our captives, Like channels in the South.

content: 5 They who are sowing with tears With shouting shall reap:
content_old: 5 They who are sowing with tears With shouting shall reap:

content: A Song of Ascents. Solomon’s
content_old: A Song of Ascents. Solomon’s

content: 1 If Yahweh build not the house In vain have the builders of it toiled thereon, If Yahweh watch not the city In vain hath the watchman kept awake:
content_old: 1 If Yahweh build not the house In vain have the builders of it toiled thereon, If Yahweh watch not the city In vain hath the watchman kept awake:

content: 2 Vain for you— To be early in rising､ To be late in lying down､ To be eating the bread of wearisome toil, So would he give his beloved one sleep.
content_old: 2 Vain for you— To be early in rising､ To be late in lying down､ To be eating the bread of wearisome toil, So would he give his beloved one sleep.

content: 3 Lo! An inheritance from Yahweh are children, A reward the fruit of the womb:
content_old: 3 Lo! An inheritance from Yahweh are children, A reward the fruit of the womb:

content: 4 As arrows in the hand of a warrior, So are the children of young men.
content_old: 4 As arrows in the hand of a warrior, So are the children of young men.

content: A Song of Ascents
content_old: A Song of Ascents

content: 1 How happy is every one that revereth Yahweh, Who walketh in his ways!
content_old: 1 How happy is every one that revereth Yahweh, Who walketh in his ways!

content: 2 The labour of thine own hands surely thou shalt eat, How happy thou, and well for thine!
content_old: 2 The labour of thine own hands surely thou shalt eat, How happy thou, and well for thine!

content: 3 Thy wife like a fruitful vine､ Within the recesses of thy house,— Thy children like plantings of olive-trees, Round about thy table.
content_old: 3 Thy wife like a fruitful vine､ Within the recesses of thy house,— Thy children like plantings of olive-trees, Round about thy table.

content: 4 Lo! thus shall be blessed the man Who revereth Yahweh.
content_old: 4 Lo! thus shall be blessed the man Who revereth Yahweh.

content: 5 Yahweh will bless thee､ out of Zion,— And behold thou the welfare of Jerusalem, All the days of thy life!
content_old: 5 Yahweh will bless thee､ out of Zion,— And behold thou the welfare of Jerusalem, All the days of thy life!

content: A Song of Ascents
content_old: A Song of Ascents

content: 1 Many a time have they harassed me from my youth, Well may Israel say:
content_old: 1 Many a time have they harassed me from my youth, Well may Israel say:

content: 2 Many a time have they harassed me from youth, Yet have they not prevailed against me.
content_old: 2 Many a time have they harassed me from youth, Yet have they not prevailed against me.

content: 3 Upon my back have ploughmen ploughed, They have lengthened their furrow!
content_old: 3 Upon my back have ploughmen ploughed, They have lengthened their furrow!

content: 4 Yahweh is righteous, He hath cut asunder the cords of the lawless.
content_old: 4 Yahweh is righteous, He hath cut asunder the cords of the lawless.

content: 5 Let all who hate Zion be ashamed and shrink back:
content_old: 5 Let all who hate Zion be ashamed and shrink back:

content: 6 Let them become like the grass of housetops, Which before it is pulled up hath withered;
content_old: 6 Let them become like the grass of housetops, Which before it is pulled up hath withered;

content: 7 Wherewith no reaper hath filled his hand､ Nor binder his bosom:
content_old: 7 Wherewith no reaper hath filled his hand､ Nor binder his bosom:

content: A Song of Ascents
content_old: A Song of Ascents

content: 1 Out of the depths have I cried unto thee､ O Yahweh.
content_old: 1 Out of the depths have I cried unto thee､ O Yahweh.

content: 2 O My Lord! hearken thou unto my voice,— Let thine ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications
content_old: 2 O My Lord! hearken thou unto my voice,— Let thine ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications

content: 3 If iniquities thou shouldest mark､ O Yah O My Lord､ who could stand?
content_old: 3 If iniquities thou shouldest mark､ O Yah O My Lord､ who could stand?

content: 4 But with thee is forgiveness, That thou mayest be revered.
content_old: 4 But with thee is forgiveness, That thou mayest be revered.

content: 5 I have waited for Yahweh My soul hath waited for his word;
content_old: 5 I have waited for Yahweh My soul hath waited for his word;

content: 6 I have hoped､ O my soul､ for My Lord, More than they Who watch for the morning, Who watch for the morning.
content_old: 6 I have hoped､ O my soul､ for My Lord, More than they Who watch for the morning, Who watch for the morning.

content: 7 Wait､ O Israel､ for Yahweh,— For with Yahweh is lovingkindness, And there aboundeth with him—redemption.
content_old: 7 Wait､ O Israel､ for Yahweh,— For with Yahweh is lovingkindness, And there aboundeth with him—redemption.

content: A Song of Ascents. David’s
content_old: A Song of Ascents. David’s

content: 1 O Yahweh､ my heart is not haughty､ Nor are mine eyes lofty, Neither have I moved among great matters､ Or among affairs too wonderful for me.
content_old: 1 O Yahweh､ my heart is not haughty､ Nor are mine eyes lofty, Neither have I moved among great matters､ Or among affairs too wonderful for me.

content: 2 Surely I have soothed and silenced my soul,— Like a weaned child､ concerning his mother, Like a weaned child､ concerning myself—mine own soul.
content_old: 2 Surely I have soothed and silenced my soul,— Like a weaned child､ concerning his mother, Like a weaned child､ concerning myself—mine own soul.

content: A Song of Ascents
content_old: A Song of Ascents

content: 1 Remember､ O Yahweh､ unto David, All his humiliations!
content_old: 1 Remember､ O Yahweh､ unto David, All his humiliations!

content: 2 What he Sware to Yahweh,— Vowed to the Mighty One of Jacob:
content_old: 2 What he Sware to Yahweh,— Vowed to the Mighty One of Jacob:

content: 3 Surely I will not enter the home of my own house, Nor ascend my curtained couch;
content_old: 3 Surely I will not enter the home of my own house, Nor ascend my curtained couch;

content: 4 I will not give sleep to mine eyes, Nor to mine eye-lashes slumber;
content_old: 4 I will not give sleep to mine eyes, Nor to mine eye-lashes slumber;

content: 5 Until I find A place for Yahweh, Habitations for the Mighty One of Jacob.
content_old: 5 Until I find A place for Yahweh, Habitations for the Mighty One of Jacob.

content: 6 Lo! we heard of it at Ephrathah, We found it in the fields of the wood.
content_old: 6 Lo! we heard of it at Ephrathah, We found it in the fields of the wood.

content: 7 We would enter his habitations, We would bow down at his footstool.
content_old: 7 We would enter his habitations, We would bow down at his footstool.

content: 8 Arise! O Yahweh､ unto thy place of rest, Thou､ and the ark of thy strength.
content_old: 8 Arise! O Yahweh､ unto thy place of rest, Thou､ and the ark of thy strength.

content: 9 Thy priests let them be clothed with righteousness, Thy men of lovingkindness let them shout for joy!
content_old: 9 Thy priests let them be clothed with righteousness, Thy men of lovingkindness let them shout for joy!

content: 10 For the sake of David thy servant Do not turn away the face of thine Anointed One.
content_old: 10 For the sake of David thy servant Do not turn away the face of thine Anointed One.

content: 11 Yahweh hath sworn unto David､ In faithfulness will he not turn from it,— Of the fruit of thy body Will I seat on thy throne.
content_old: 11 Yahweh hath sworn unto David､ In faithfulness will he not turn from it,— Of the fruit of thy body Will I seat on thy throne.

content: 12 If thy sons keep my covenant､ And my testimony which I will teach them Even their sons unto futurity Shall sit on thy throne.
content_old: 12 If thy sons keep my covenant､ And my testimony which I will teach them Even their sons unto futurity Shall sit on thy throne.

content: 13 For Yahweh hath chosen Zion,— He hath desired it as a dwelling for himself:
content_old: 13 For Yahweh hath chosen Zion,— He hath desired it as a dwelling for himself:

content: 14 This is my place of rest unto futurity, Here will I dwell､ for I have desired it;
content_old: 14 This is my place of rest unto futurity, Here will I dwell､ for I have desired it;

content: 15 Her provision will I abundantly bless, Her needy ones will I satisfy with bread;
content_old: 15 Her provision will I abundantly bless, Her needy ones will I satisfy with bread;

content: 16 And her priests will I clothe with salvation, And her men of lovingkindness shall shout aloud for joy;
content_old: 16 And her priests will I clothe with salvation, And her men of lovingkindness shall shout aloud for joy;

content: 17 There will I cause to bud a horn to David, I have prepared a lamp for mine Anointed One;
content_old: 17 There will I cause to bud a horn to David, I have prepared a lamp for mine Anointed One;

content: A Song of Ascents. David’s
content_old: A Song of Ascents. David’s

content: 1 Lo! how good and how delightful For brethren to dwell together even as one.
content_old: 1 Lo! how good and how delightful For brethren to dwell together even as one.

content: 2 Like the precious oil upon the head､ Descending upon the beard; The beard of Aaron,— Which descended unto the opening of his robe:
content_old: 2 Like the precious oil upon the head､ Descending upon the beard; The beard of Aaron,— Which descended unto the opening of his robe:

content: A Song of Ascents
content_old: A Song of Ascents

content: 1 Lo! bless Yahweh､ all ye servants of Yahweh, Who stand in the house of Yahweh by night:
content_old: 1 Lo! bless Yahweh､ all ye servants of Yahweh, Who stand in the house of Yahweh by night:

content: 2 Lift up your hand in holiness, And bless Yahweh.
content_old: 2 Lift up your hand in holiness, And bless Yahweh.

content: 1 Praise ye Yah､ Praise ye the Name of Yahweh, Praise､ O ye servants of Yahweh;
content_old: 1 Praise ye Yah､ Praise ye the Name of Yahweh, Praise､ O ye servants of Yahweh;

content: 2 Who stand In the house of Yahweh, In the courts of the house of our God.
content_old: 2 Who stand In the house of Yahweh, In the courts of the house of our God.

content: 3 Praise ye Yah､ For good is Yahweh, Sing praises to his Name, For it is full of delight;
content_old: 3 Praise ye Yah､ For good is Yahweh, Sing praises to his Name, For it is full of delight;

content: 4 For Jacob hath Yah chosen for himself, Israel､ for his own treasure.
content_old: 4 For Jacob hath Yah chosen for himself, Israel､ for his own treasure.

content: 5 For I know that great is Yahweh, Yea our Lord is beyond all gods.
content_old: 5 For I know that great is Yahweh, Yea our Lord is beyond all gods.

content: 6 Whatsoever Yahweh hath pleased he hath done,— In the heavens and on the earth, In the seas､ and all resounding deeps:
content_old: 6 Whatsoever Yahweh hath pleased he hath done,— In the heavens and on the earth, In the seas､ and all resounding deeps:

content: 7 Causing vapours to ascend from the end of the earth,— Lightnings for the rain hath he made, Bringing forth wind out of his treasuries.
content_old: 7 Causing vapours to ascend from the end of the earth,— Lightnings for the rain hath he made, Bringing forth wind out of his treasuries.

content: 8 Who smote the firstborn of Egypt, Both of man､ and of beast;
content_old: 8 Who smote the firstborn of Egypt, Both of man､ and of beast;

content: 9 Sent signs and wonders into thy midst､ O Egypt, Upon Pharaoh, and upon all his servants.
content_old: 9 Sent signs and wonders into thy midst､ O Egypt, Upon Pharaoh, and upon all his servants.

content: 10 Who smote great nations, And slew mighty kings:
content_old: 10 Who smote great nations, And slew mighty kings:

content: 11 Sihon､ king of the Amorites､ And Og､ king of Bashan, And all the kingdoms of Canaan;
content_old: 11 Sihon､ king of the Amorites､ And Og､ king of Bashan, And all the kingdoms of Canaan;

content: 12 And gave their land as an inheritance, An inheritance to Israel his people.
content_old: 12 And gave their land as an inheritance, An inheritance to Israel his people.

content: 13 O Yahweh! thy Name is age-abiding,— O Yahweh! thy memorial is to generation after generation.
content_old: 13 O Yahweh! thy Name is age-abiding,— O Yahweh! thy memorial is to generation after generation.

content: 14 For Yahweh will vindicate his people,— And on his servants have compassion.
content_old: 14 For Yahweh will vindicate his people,— And on his servants have compassion.

content: 15 The idols of the nations are silver and gold, The work of the hands of men:
content_old: 15 The idols of the nations are silver and gold, The work of the hands of men:

content: 16 A mouth have they､ but they speak not, Eyes have they､ but they see not;
content_old: 16 A mouth have they､ but they speak not, Eyes have they､ but they see not;

content: 17 Ears have they､ but they hear not, Nose—there is no breath in their mouth.
content_old: 17 Ears have they､ but they hear not, Nose—there is no breath in their mouth.

content: 18 Like unto them shall be they who make them, Every one who trusteth in them.
content_old: 18 Like unto them shall be they who make them, Every one who trusteth in them.

content: 19 O house of Israel! bless Yahweh, O house of Aaron! bless Yahweh;
content_old: 19 O house of Israel! bless Yahweh, O house of Aaron! bless Yahweh;

content: 20 O house of Levi! bless Yahweh, Ye that revere Yahweh! bless Yahweh.
content_old: 20 O house of Levi! bless Yahweh, Ye that revere Yahweh! bless Yahweh.

content: 1 Give ye thanks to Yahweh For he is good, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 1 Give ye thanks to Yahweh For he is good, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 2 Give ye thanks to the God of gods, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 2 Give ye thanks to the God of gods, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 3 Give ye thanks to the Lord of lords, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 3 Give ye thanks to the Lord of lords, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 4 To him that doeth great wonders by himself alone, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 4 To him that doeth great wonders by himself alone, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 5 To him that made the heavens with understanding, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 5 To him that made the heavens with understanding, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 6 To him that stretched out the earth above the waters, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 6 To him that stretched out the earth above the waters, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 7 To him that made great lights, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 7 To him that made great lights, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 8 The sun to rule the day, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 8 The sun to rule the day, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 9 The moon and stars to rule the night, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 9 The moon and stars to rule the night, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 10 To him that smote Egypt in their firstborn, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 10 To him that smote Egypt in their firstborn, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 11 And brought forth Israel out of their midst, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 11 And brought forth Israel out of their midst, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 12 With a firm hand､ and a stretched-out arm, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 12 With a firm hand､ and a stretched-out arm, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 13 To him that divided the Red Sea into divisions, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 13 To him that divided the Red Sea into divisions, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 14 And caused Israel to pass through the midst thereof, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 14 And caused Israel to pass through the midst thereof, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 15 And shook off Pharaoh and his army in the Red Sea, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 15 And shook off Pharaoh and his army in the Red Sea, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 16 To him that led his people through the desert, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 16 To him that led his people through the desert, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 17 To him that smote great kings, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 17 To him that smote great kings, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 18 And slew majestic kings, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 18 And slew majestic kings, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 19 Even Sihon､ king of the Amorites, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 19 Even Sihon､ king of the Amorites, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 20 Also Og､ king of Bashan, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 20 Also Og､ king of Bashan, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 21 And gave their land for an inheritance, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 21 And gave their land for an inheritance, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 22 An inheritance to Israel his servant, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 22 An inheritance to Israel his servant, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 23 Who in our low estate remembered us, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 23 Who in our low estate remembered us, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 24 And freed us with force from our adversaries, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 24 And freed us with force from our adversaries, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 25 Who giveth food to all flesh, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.
content_old: 25 Who giveth food to all flesh, For age-abiding is his lovingkindness.

content: 1 By the rivers of Babylon there we sat down､ yea we wept— When we remembered Zion:
content_old: 1 By the rivers of Babylon there we sat down､ yea we wept— When we remembered Zion:

content: 2 Upon the willows—in the midst thereof Hanged we our lyres:
content_old: 2 Upon the willows—in the midst thereof Hanged we our lyres:

content: 3 For there our captors asked of us words of song､ And our plunderers—gladness,— Sing us of the songs of Zion!
content_old: 3 For there our captors asked of us words of song､ And our plunderers—gladness,— Sing us of the songs of Zion!

content: 4 How shall we sing the song of Yahweh, On a foreign soil?
content_old: 4 How shall we sing the song of Yahweh, On a foreign soil?

content: 5 If I forget thee､ O Jerusalem Let my right-hand forget:
content_old: 5 If I forget thee､ O Jerusalem Let my right-hand forget:

content: 6 Let my tongue cleave to the roof of my mouth､ If I do not remember thee! If I do not lift up Jerusalem above the head of mine own gladness.
content_old: 6 Let my tongue cleave to the roof of my mouth､ If I do not remember thee! If I do not lift up Jerusalem above the head of mine own gladness.

content: 7 Remember､ O Yahweh､ against the sons of Edom､ the day of Jerusalem,— How they continued to say— Overthrow! Overthrow! Unto the foundation within it.
content_old: 7 Remember､ O Yahweh､ against the sons of Edom､ the day of Jerusalem,— How they continued to say— Overthrow! Overthrow! Unto the foundation within it.

content: 8 O ruined daughter of Babylon,— How happy the man who shall repay thee Thy dealing､ wherewith thou didst deal with us!
content_old: 8 O ruined daughter of Babylon,— How happy the man who shall repay thee Thy dealing､ wherewith thou didst deal with us!
